title: Account hacked and ticket's report
body:
So recently it just happens to cannot login in my account so i try to check it, and it says username or password its not correct so i try to use the forgot password and username. After that i got an email and i did get an username and a password and when i log in to the game it was a new account and i was confused.
So i write an ticket to riot i give all the information and all i got it was this:
"Greetings,

I’ve looked at the account in question, and unfortunately the information you have provided doesn’t match this account. As a result, I am unable to provide you with access to the account. Please understand that these steps are taken to ensure the security of our players and their accounts.

I know this can be frustrating, so please contact me again if you remember any more information about the account."

So i just spend a lot of money RP and everything on this game i even give to them all my RP ID's transaction and they says its not my account? How it is not my account and the person who hacked me he not even play an game its inactive and i think the Riot Support it will leave me like that and i will get nothing just to see the "hacker" playing or selling my account to other people and me i just get a lot of RP stealing. Nice job and all i can do its watching and even so i get the "hacker" email and they can't do anything... If someone can help me please leave a comment here Thanks a lot and i need it really fast help because i even have save my ID credit card that i use to buy RP.

replies.body:
I'm sorry to hear about the issues you've had trying to recover your account. I'm not able to be of much help on the boards, since account recovery involves _personal information_. I can encourage you to look over the questions asked and try to remember as much information as possible. I know this can be frustrating, but we cannot recover an account until we are 100% sure that it is the original account creator. 

Whenever you're ready reach out to our account recovery specialists in [**another ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Hey Broporo{{summoner:31}} , would you be able to take a look at my post please? 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/8gKZHAPE-riot-support-please-read-this

I appreciate it!

I give them all my information even the email of the hacker who did it i get it and i give them all my ID RP transaction from the 2015 to 2017 and even the last transaction who was on the 3/10/2017 what more proof they need to show them it is my account and even frustrating it is the guy he not even play on  that account i'm 100% he try to sell it and i am sure i will get my account back when it will be banned :| So thanks that's all i can say

An update to this all they say it is nothing of my information its not matching and i told them username password and even the email was changed all i can give them are my in game name and the RP Transaction and i'm 100% my own account has bean sell to another person and i can't recover it at all so i told them to perma ban it or at least to give my RP back to another account ( i'm sure they not gonna do that) but at least i am very confused with this Riot Support it is very slow very bad and i just get 0 help from them :| all i can say to others player just don't  give any information to anyone because no one its gonna help you out here. Thanks for nothing and for the 0 help.
Are you able to sign into the boards on your account?

No i just use another account a new one to text this and the Riot team they just copy paste all the same email i saw and i give then all my ID Rp transaction and they say it is not mine i am not the owner..
